attributes.action: Call on the Olympic Committee to scrap the ridicolous logo unveiled this week for the 2012 Olympic Games.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ridiculous logo launched this week has made the country a laughing stock. Already part of the moving art work has had to be removed due to causing epileptic fits.
There are far better logos appeared on various websites since this logo was unveiled, or they could do worse than simply return to the original logo, already well known, used for the successful bid for the games.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
